entry.title: Think @fuel_network is underfarmed. This is not another L2 EVM fork but actually really cool tech - built by one of the best teams out there. You can ...
entry.summary: Think @fuel_network is underfarmed. This is not another L2 EVM fork but actually really cool tech - built by one of the best teams out there. You can deposit interest bearing assets like $weETH or $sUSDe so the opportunity cost is small.
